name: Hope For Village
description: Hope For Village is an Old-School RPG game. Farming, crafting, combat, fishing and more, just explore it! Monsters, wild animals, enemies of kingdom... Who do you think will win?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 800 MB available space
